name: Musical Cannons
description:
Musical Canons is a pseudo rhythm game where you move through a  musical pentagram using cannons that move with the beat. Throughout the level you'll find obstacles and you'll get to challenge 3 different levels with music composed by me and my teammates. This project was made in less than a week for Atlantic University College - Video game week Game Jam. 

Contact me at: xy@netwi5.com

 or https://www.linkedin.com/in/angel-betancourt-0927ab176/
